title: Get started
text: NCAA uses unique team ID women's men's volleyball team season. first need get ID find_team_id(). use Nebraska illustrate functions {ncaavolleyballr}. However, find team ID, first know exact team name NCAA uses reference team. Nebraska’s team name Nebraska, Neb., University Nebraska-Lincoln, UNL, something else? can use find_team_name() get vector teams match pattern. Looks like ’s “Nebraska”. now can pass find_team_id() along year ’re interested . function queries two data sets ship package: wvb_teams mvb_teams. two data sets simply output get_teams() function applied sports “WVB” “MVB” respectively. get_teams() function can applied sports get list team IDs. since ’ve already done men’s women’s volleyball, won’t need use get_teams(). OK, let’s find Nebraska’s team ID 2024. ’ll need team ID access team’s statistics. can either assign output object just add top pipeline. can also pass vectors team names years find team IDs multiple teams years. Note processed per year, last example teams ID’s Nebraska Wisconsin 2020 2021, etc.

title: Get started
text: Now team ID, can use access season summary statistics particular team year (e.g., Nebraska 2024).

title: Get started
text: get stats, can extract information team’s season team_season_info(), NCAA’s main page team year includes tab called “Schedule/Results”. team_season_stats() function extracts information team’s venue, coach, records, well table schedule results. returns list, can subset specific components $. instance, wanted calculate average attendance per game: Wow, Nebraska volleyball attracted attendees per game 2021 Oakland Athletics professional baseball team!
code: (neb2024team <- find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>    team_season_info()) #> $team_info #>      team_id team_name conference_id conference div   yr    season #> 1466  585290  Nebraska           827    Big Ten   1 2024 2024-2025 #>  #> $arena #>                  Arena name                    Capacity                  Year built  #> "Bob Devaney Sports Center"                     "7,907"                      "1975"  #>  #> $coach #>               Name         Alma mater            Seasons             Record  #>        "John Cook" "San Diego - 1979"               "32"          "883-176"  #>  #> $record #>      Overall record      Overall streak   Conference record   Conference streak         Home record  #>      "33-3 (0.917)"        "Streak: L1"      "19-1 (0.950)"        "Streak: L1"      "22-0 (1.000)"  #>         Home streak         Road record         Road streak      Neutral record      Neutral streak  #>       "Streak: W45"      "10-2 (0.833)"        "Streak: W1"       "1-1 (0.500)"        "Streak: L1"  #> Non-division record Non-division streak  #>       "0-0 (0.000)"         "Streak: 0"  #>  #> $schedule #> # A tibble: 36 × 4 #>    Date       Opponent                 Result Attendance #>    <chr>      <chr>                    <chr>  <chr>      #>  1 08/27/2024 Kentucky @Louisville, KY W 3-1  9,280      #>  2 08/30/2024 A&M-Corpus Christi       W 3-0  8,956      #>  3 08/31/2024 TCU                      W 3-1  8,695      #>  4 09/03/2024 @ SMU                    L 0-3  6,773      #>  5 09/05/2024 The Citadel              W 3-0  8,607      #>  6 09/07/2024 Montana St.              W 3-0  8,456      #>  7 09/10/2024 Creighton                W 3-2  8,924      #>  8 09/13/2024 Arizona St.              W 3-0  8,772      #>  9 09/14/2024 Wichita St.              W 3-0  8,541      #> 10 09/18/2024 Stanford                 W 3-0  8,952      #> # ℹ 26 more rows neb2024team$schedule |>   dplyr::pull(Attendance) |>   sub(",", "", x = _) |>   as.numeric() |>   mean() #> [1] 8765.333

title: Get started
text: NCAA makes team season summary stats available since. included conference starting 2020 (conference data previous seasons currently available). default, teams’s stats returned. return opposing teams stats, set opponents = TRUE. ’s table describing different team statistics returned.

title: Get started
text: NCAA’s main page team includes tab called “Team Statistics” (e.g., Nebraska 2024). player_season_stats() function extracts table player summary statistics particular season, well team opponent statistics (though can omitted). returns players, along TEAM, opponent, overall team summaries. include player stats, set team_stats = FALSE. returns stats included team_season_stats(), plus GP GS, Games Played Games Started, respectively.
code: find_team_id("Nebraska", 2024) |>   player_season_stats() #> # A tibble: 16 × 29 #>    Season    Team  Conference Number Player Yr    Pos   Ht    Hometown `High School`    GP    GS     S #>    <chr>     <chr> <chr>       <dbl> <chr>  <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>    <chr>         <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         2 Berge… So    S     6-1   Sioux F… O'Gorman         36    36   122 #>  2 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         5 Rebek… Jr    MB    6-4   Lincoln… Waverly          35    34   109 #>  3 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         6 Laney… So    L/DS  5-3   Raleigh… Leesville Ro…    36     0   121 #>  4 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         7 Maisi… Jr    L/DS  5-6   Firth, … Norris            9     0    13 #>  5 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         8 Lexi … Sr    L/DS  5-5   Sterlin… Sterling         36     0   122 #>  6 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten         9 Kenne… Sr    S     6-0   Eagan, … Eagan            35     0   112 #>  7 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        10 Olivi… Fr    L/DS  5-6   Benning… Bennington       36     4   122 #>  8 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        11 Leyla… Sr    MB    6-4   San Die… La Jolla         13     4    23 #>  9 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        12 Taylo… Sr    OH    6-5   Plainfi… Plainfield C…    33    20    88 #> 10 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        13 Merri… Sr    OH    6-4   Gardend… Gardendale       36    36   122 #> 11 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        15 Andi … So    MB    6-3   Brighto… Brighton         34    34   114 #> 12 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        22 Linds… Sr    OH    6-4   Papilli… Skutt Cathol…    24    12    50 #> 13 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        27 Harpe… So    OH    6-2   Ann Arb… Skyline          36    36   121 #> 14 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        NA TEAM   -     -     -     <NA>     <NA>             NA    NA    NA #> 15 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        NA Totals -     -     -     <NA>     <NA>             NA    NA   122 #> 16 2024-2025 Nebr… Big Ten        NA Oppon… -     -     -     <NA>     <NA>             NA    NA   122 #> # title: Get started
text: addition overall season summary stats, NCAA provides match-level data teams individual players.

title: Get started
text: get overall match stats team particular season, use team_match_stats(). Note run function relies {chromote} package, must Google Chrome installed computer.
code: find_team_id(team = "Nebraska", year = 2024) |>   team_match_stats() #> # A tibble: 36 × 22 #>    Season    Date       Team     Conference Opponent   Result     S Kills Errors #>    <chr>     <chr>      <chr>    <chr>      <chr>      <chr>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> #>  1 2024-2025 08/27/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Kentucky … W 3-1      4    47     16 #>  2 2024-2025 08/30/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    A&M-Corpu… W 3-0      3    48      7 #>  3 2024-2025 08/31/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    TCU        W 3-1      4    55     25 #>  4 2024-2025 09/03/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    @ SMU      L 0-3      3    36     18 #>  5 2024-2025 09/05/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    The Citad… W 3-0      3    43      7 #>  6 2024-2025 09/07/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Montana S… W 3-0      3    47     11 #>  7 2024-2025 09/10/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Creighton  W 3-2      5    73     27 #>  8 2024-2025 09/13/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Arizona S… W 3-0      3    48     12 #>  9 2024-2025 09/14/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Wichita S… W 3-0      3    50      8 #> 10 2024-2025 09/18/2024 Nebraska Big Ten    Stanford   W 3-0      3    38     13 #> # ℹ 26 more rows #> # ℹ 13 more variables: `Total Attacks` <dbl>, `Hit Pct` <dbl>, Assists <dbl>, #> #   Aces <dbl>, SErr <dbl>, Digs <dbl>, RetAtt <dbl>, RErr <dbl>, #> #   `Block Solos` <dbl>, `Block Assists` <dbl>, BErr <dbl>, PTS <dbl>, #> #   BHE <dbl>

title: Get started
text: Similarly, can get match stats player single match. , must know NCAA’s contest ID particular match matches ’re interested . Use find_team_contests() function return data frame matches particular team season, along contest IDs. contest IDs, can grab one pass player_match_stats(). returns list two elements—one team. just want return single team’s match stats, can specify team argument. Also, default, team stats included output, can remove team_stats = FALSE.
code: (neb2024contests <- find_team_id(team = "Nebraska", year = 2024) |>   find_team_contests()) #> # A tibble: 36 × 6 #>    date       team     opponent           result attendance contest #>    <chr>      <chr>    <chr>              <chr>       <dbl> <chr>   #>  1 08/27/2024 Nebraska Kentucky           W 3-1        9280 5362360 #>  2 08/30/2024 Nebraska A&M-Corpus Christi W 3-0        8956 5362361 #>  3 08/31/2024 Nebraska TCU                W 3-1        8695 5362362 #>  4 09/03/2024 Nebraska SMU                L 0-3        6773 5362363 #>  5 09/05/2024 Nebraska The Citadel        W 3-0        8607 5362364 #>  6 09/07/2024 Nebraska Montana St.        W 3-0        8456 5362365 #>  7 09/10/2024 Nebraska Creighton          W 3-2        8924 5362366 #>  8 09/13/2024 Nebraska Arizona St.        W 3-0        8772 5362367 #>  9 09/14/2024 Nebraska Wichita St.        W 3-0        8541 5362368 #> 10 09/18/2024 Nebraska Stanford           W 3-0        8952 5362369 #> # ℹ 26 more rows player_match_stats(contest = "6080708") #> # A tibble: 25 × 26 #>    Season    Date       Team   Conference `Opponent Team` `Opponent Conference` Location Number Player #>    <chr>     <date>     <chr>  <chr>      <chr>           <chr>                 <chr>     <dbl> <chr>  #>  1 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away          2 Ava F… #>  2 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away          3 Gilli… #>  3 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away          8 Camry… #>  4 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away          5 Jorda… #>  5 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away         14 Carol… #>  6 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away         44 Maggi… #>  7 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away         24 Quinn… #>  8 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away          9 Jess … #>  9 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away         11 Jocel… #> 10 2024-2025 2024-12-19 Penn … Big Ten    Nebraska        Big Ten               Away         21 Izzy … #> # title: Get started
text: Though season, match, play--play data useful individual level, can useful aggregated. group_stats() function aggregates season, match, play--play data multiple teams /years applying player_season_stats(), player_match_stats(), match_pbp() across teams years. don’t examples, take run. also convenience functions conference_stats() division_stats() automatically extract data particular conference NCAA division. Well, covers functionality {ncaavolleyballr}. find bugs questions, please reach .
code: group_stats(teams = c("Nebraska", "Wisconsin"), year = 2023:2024, level = "season") #> $playerdata #> # A tibble: 54 × 30 #>    Season    Team     Conference Number Player        Yr    Pos   Ht       GP    GS     S Kills Errors #>    <chr>     <chr>    <chr>       <dbl> <chr>         <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> #>  1 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten         2 Bergen Reilly Fr Choboy  Fr    L/DS  5-3      34    33   117     0      1 #>  4 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten         7 Maisie Boesi… So    L/DS  5-6      18     0    36     0      0 #>  5 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten         8 Lexi Rodrigu… Jr    L/DS  5-5      35     0   121     1      0 #>  6 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten         9 Kennedi Orr   Jr    S     6-0      29     0    96     1      0 #>  7 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten        11 Hayden Kubik  So    OH    6-2       9     0    10     3      7 #>  8 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten        13 Merritt Beas… Jr    OH    6-4      35    35   121   455    153 #>  9 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten        14 Ally Batenho… Jr    OH    6-5      30     2    87   196     91 #> 10 2023-2024 Nebraska Big Ten        15 Andi Jackson  Fr    MB    6-3      34    34   118   237 `Block Assists` <dbl>, BErr <dbl>, #> #   PTS <dbl>, BHE <dbl>, `Trpl Dbl` <dbl>, `Dbl Dbl` <dbl>, Hometown <chr>, `High School` <chr> #>  #> $teamdata #> # A tibble: 4 × 23 #>   Season    Team title: Authors and Citation
text: Jeffrey R. Stevens. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Stevens JR (2025). Extract Data NCAA Women's Men's Volleyball Website. R package version 0.4.3, https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/ncaavolleyballr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website},   author = {Jeffrey R. Stevens},   note = {R package version 0.4.3},   year = {2025},   url = {https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/ncaavolleyballr}, }

what: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Inspired NCAA data extraction functions {baseballr} package, goal {ncaavolleyballr} extract women’s men’s volleyball information NCAA website. functions package can extract team records/schedules player statistics 2020-2025 NCAA women’s men’s divisions , II, III volleyball teams. Functions can aggregate statistics teams, conferences, divisions, custom groups teams.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: can install stable released version flashr CRAN : can install developmental versions GitHub :

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: suite functions can used extract season, match, play--play data teams players. See Getting Started vignette thorough description functions.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: NCAA uses unique team ID women’s men’s volleyball team season. access team’s season data, first need get ID find_team_id(). instance, find ID Penn State’s 2024 season: team ID, can now extract overall season performance data team’s players player_season_stats().

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: NCAA also uses unique contest ID women’s men’s volleyball match. easiest way get ID find_team_contest(), returns contest ID matches particular season (using Team ID provided find_team_id()). instance, find contest ID 2024 National Championship match Louisville Penn State: , can see contest ID 6080706. pass contest ID player_match_stats() function, ’ll get list two data frames (one team contest) contain player statistics match. want get just Penn State player data, can set team = "Penn St.".
code: find_team_id("Penn St.", 2024) |>    find_team_contests() |>    tail() player_match_stats(contest = "6080706", team = "Penn St.")

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Play--play data also available match_pbp(). returns data frame events players.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: default, functions return information women’s teams, can set return men’s information setting sport = "MVB". can also aggregate data across conferences, divisions, custom groups conference_stats(), division_stats(), group_stats().

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Scraping large amounts data NCAA stats site can take long time prone unstable connections. Accessing website frequently multiple functions simultaneously can result IP address blocked. get around issue, scraped data 2020-2024 posted data page.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: cite {ncaavolleyballr}, use: Stevens JR (2025). Extract Data NCAA Women’s Men’s Volleyball Website. R package version 0.4.3, https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/ncaavolleyballr.

title: Extract Data from NCAA Womens and Mens Volleyball Website
text: Many thanks Bill Petti making code NCAA stats extraction freely available {baseballr} package. thank Tyler Widdison inspiring extract play--play data (check {ncaavolleyballR} package similar functionality). Code {baseballr} {rvest} (licensed MIT license) incorporated modified package. volleyball background logo designed Freepik.

what: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
text: wrapper around group_stats() extracts season, match, pbp data players teams chosen conference. season stats, aggregates player data team data separate data frames combines list. match pbp stats, aggregates data frame. Conferences names can found ncaa_conferences.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
code: conference_stats(   year = NULL,   conf = NULL,   level = NULL,   sport = "WVB",   save = FALSE,   path = "." )

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
text: year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. conf NCAA conference name. level Character string defining whether aggregate "teamseason", "teammatch", "playermatch", match play--play ("pbp") data. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball). save Logical whether save statistics locally CSVs (default FALSE). path Character string path save statistics files.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
text: function requires internet connectivity checks NCAA website information. also uses {chromote} package requires Google Chrome installed.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA conference and seasons — conference_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() conference_stats(year = 2024, conf = "Peach Belt", level = "teamseason") }

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons — division_stats
text: wrapper around group_stats() extracts season, match, pbp data players teams chosen division. season stats, aggregates player data team data separate data frames combines list. match pbp stats, aggregates data frame.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons — division_stats
code: division_stats(   year = NULL,   division = 1,   level = NULL,   sport = "WVB",   save = FALSE,   path = "." )

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons — division_stats
text: year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. division NCAA division (must 1, 2, 3). level Character string defining whether aggregate "teamseason", "teammatch", "playermatch", match play--play ("pbp") data. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball). save Logical whether save statistics locally CSVs (default FALSE). path Character string path save statistics files.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons — division_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics for a NCAA division and seasons — division_stats
text: Note: Changes NCAA website made large-scale scraping unstable, can trigger IP address blocks lots requests. function seems trigger blocks frequently now, use caution scraping large amounts data.

text: function requires internet connectivity checks NCAA website information. also uses {chromote} package requires Google Chrome installed.

Extract data frame of team names, IDs, conference, division, and season — get_teams

what: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
text: function aggregates player statistics play--play information within season applying team_match_stats(), player_season_stats(), player_match_stats(), match_pbp() across groups teams (player_season_stats()) across contests within season (team_match_stats(), player_match_stats() match_pbp()). season stats, aggregates player data team data separate data frames combines list. instance, want extract data teams women's 2024 Final Four, pass vector c("Louisville", "Nebraska", "Penn State", "Pittsburgh") function. match play--play data team, pass single team name year. Team names can found ncaa_teams using find_team_name().

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
code: group_stats(   teams = NULL,   year = NULL,   level = "teamseason",   unique = TRUE,   sport = "WVB" )

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
text: teams Character vector team names aggregate. year Numeric vector years fall desired seasons. level Character string defining whether aggregate "teamseason", "teammatch", "playermatch", match play--play ("pbp") data. unique Logical indicating whether process unique contests (TRUE) whether process duplicated contests (FALSE). Default TRUE. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
text: season level, returns list data frames player statistics team statistics. match pbp levels, returns data frame player statistics play--play information respectively.

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
text: function requires internet connectivity checks NCAA website information. also uses {chromote} package requires Google Chrome installed.

title: Aggregate player statistics and play-by-play information — group_stats
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() group_stats(teams = c("Louisville", "Nebraska", "Penn St.", "Pittsburgh"), year = 2024, level = "teamseason") }

what: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website — ncaavolleyballr-package
title: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website — ncaavolleyballr-package
text: Extracts team records/schedules player statistics 2020-2025 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) women's men's divisions , II, III volleyball teams https://stats.ncaa.org. Functions can aggregate statistics teams, conferences, divisions, custom groups teams.

title: ncaavolleyballr: Extract Data from NCAA Women's and Men's Volleyball Website — ncaavolleyballr-package
text: Maintainer: Jeffrey R. Stevens jeffrey.r.stevens@protonmail.com (ORCID) [copyright holder]

what: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
text: NCAA's page match/contest includes tab called "Individual Statistics". function extracts tables player match statistics home away teams, well team statistics (though can omitted). particular team specified, team's statistics returned.

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
code: player_match_stats(   contest = NULL,   team = NULL,   team_stats = TRUE,   sport = "WVB" )

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
text: contest Contest ID determined NCAA match. find ID, use find_team_contests() team season. team Name school. Must match name used NCAA. Find exact team name find_team_name(). team_stats Logical indicating whether include (TRUE) exclude (FALSE) team statistics. Default includes team statistics player statistics. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
text: default, returns data frame includes home away team match statistics. team specified, team's data returned.

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats
text: function requires internet connectivity checks NCAA website information. also uses {chromote} package requires Google Chrome installed.

title: Extract player statistics for a particular match — player_match_stats

what: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Team Statistics". function extracts table player statistics season, well team opponent statistics (though can omitted).

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
text: team_id Team ID determined NCAA season. find ID, use find_team_id(). team_stats Logical indicating whether include (TRUE) exclude (FALSE) team statistics. Default includes team statistics player statistics.

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
text: Returns data frame player statistics. Note hometown high school added 2024.

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats
text: function requires internet connectivity checks NCAA website information. also uses {chromote} package requires Google Chrome installed.

title: Extract player statistics from a particular team and season — player_season_stats

title: Extract arena, coach, record, and schedule information for a particular team and season — team_season_info
text: NCAA's main page team includes tab called "Schedule/Results". function extracts information team's venue, coach, records, well table schedule results. returns list, can subset specific components $ (e.g., coach information object called output, use output$coach).

Extract teams statistics for season statistics from 2020-2024 — team_season_stats
text: team Name school. Must match name used NCAA. Find exact team name find_team_name(). opponent Logical indicating whether include team's stats (FALSE) opponent's stats (TRUE). Default set FALSE, returning team stats. sport Three letter abbreviation NCAA sport (must upper case; example "WVB" women's volleyball "MVB" men's volleyball).

text: https://stats.ncaa.org

title: ncaavolleyballr (development version)
text: 2025 season begun, version updated current_season() 2025 allow scraping season’s data. package website now includes data page includes data 2020-2024 separate files sport, data level, dividion, year. Data output now includes contest ID team ID columns facilitate joining datasets. NCAA’s websites now using JavaScript loading pages, functions now use rvest::read_live_html(). Unfortunately, resulted much slower processing data, large-scale scraping triggers IP address bans.

title: ncaavolleyballr (development version)
text: Chromote sessions now closed scraping data. Unit testing greatly expanded improved test code better. Documentation uses inherited notes simplify documentation changes. Air now used format code.

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.4.3
text: CRAN release: 2025-07-22 NCAA’s game--game website introduced loading page disrupted team_season_stats() team_match_stats(). team_season_stats() now gets info different page. team_match_stats() now uses rvest::read_live_html() function, requires chromote package access Google Chrome. Catch contests many sets return warning instead error

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.4.2
text: CRAN release: 2025-03-30 Increase minimum R version 4.2 Wrap URL requests tryCatch() ensure internet connection problems fail gracefully. Change examples interactive note functions require internet activity. Skip testing CRAN tests requiring internet connections. Switch vignette pre-built Rmd file.

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2025-01-23 Remove examples division_stats() get_teams() documentation. Remove deprecated group_player_stats().

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.4.0
text: Update status active lifecycle stable. Create team_season_info(), team_season_stats(), team_match_stats() functions output team-related information. Create division_stats() conference_stats() aggregate season, match, play--play statistics divisions conferences. Create vignette help Get Started. Update logo. Remove duplication match play--play stats group_stats(). Create descriptive warnings teams matches missing. Improve handling seasons matches data. cases skipped warning instead stopping error. Create suite functions check argument input Skip URL request tests CRAN CI

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.3.0
text: Improve output match_pbp() parse events players. Improve output find_team_contests() include record, attendance, canceled matches. Add match play--play levels group_stats(). Fix bug group_stats() matches canceled. Replace term “visitor” “away”. DEPRECATION: group_player_stats() renamed group_stats(). conference_player_stats() renamed conference_season_stats(). division_player_stats() renamed division_season_stats().

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.2.0
text: Add match-level functions find_team_contests(), player_match_stats(), test match_pbp() extracting match/contest IDs, player statistics, play--play information. DEPRECATION: team_player_stats() renamed player_season_stats().

title: ncaavolleyballr 0.1.0
text: Initial release. Add season-level statistics extraction `. Add conference, division, custom group aggregation conference_player_stats(), division_player_stats(), group_player_stats() Create website logo.
